title: com.apple.MCX
description: Accounts: The payload for configuring guest accounts.

DisableGuestAccount.title: Disable Guest Account
DisableGuestAccount.description: If true, disables the guest account. This property has no effect if EnableGuestAccount is true. Default: false

EnableGuestAccount.title: Enable Guest Account
EnableGuestAccount.description: If true, enables the guest account. Default: false
